page.title: 07Mattingley Area - Homelife.
page.content: Most people in the block are either connected with farming or commute to London or nearby towns. There are those who have lived in the area all their life & those only for a few years. Most of the inhabitants fall into the{middle to upper class {bracket.}Some need to work hard for the essentials, others employ domestic staff. There are a few unemployed people - mainly youngsters.{Most {houses are owner occupied}with{2 cars (a car is almost essential in this rural area). There are several 'big houses' but the people mainly live in cottages. A number of youngsters have 'nannies', own their own ponies or attend private schools. With the lack of amenities & the cost of housing the area tends to attract middle-aged or older inhabitants rather than young parents with children.
